docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Should smokers be allowed a less dangerous way to feed their nicotine addiction? Reactions from medical authorities to RJR Nabisco's virtually smokeless cigarette have ranged from skepticism to outright hostility. Antismoking groups are almost certain to challenge the company's right to market it without

headline.main: Old Age Is Not What It Used to Be

byline.original: By Carol Tavris: Carol Tavris is a social psychologist and author of ''Anger: The Misunderstood Emotion'' (Touchstone)

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Age only matters when one is aging. Now that I have arrived at a great age, I might as well be 20. - Pablo Picasso (at 80)
docs.snippet: LEAD: Age only matters when one is aging. Now that I have arrived at a great age, I might as well be 20. - Pablo Picasso (at 80)

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: INTERNATIONAL A3-13 Iranian sailors have provided data allowing the United States to recover at least three mines the captured Iranians had placed in the Persian Gulf, according to Defense Secretary Caspar W. Weinberger. Page A1
